description: Sonoda Misuzu is Ranka`s colleague at the cross dressing bar. He runs a pension in Karuizawa, Nagano, where Haruhi works during summer vacation. He holds a contest among the hosts over who will be the most refreshing and able to stay at the pension; he is swayed by Kaoru and Hikaru after a display of "brotherly love" earns them "100 refreshing points". His real name is Isao. He was formerly a banker and has a love for making frilly Lolita-type clothing.
name: Sonoda Misuzu
